name: Maluki
description:
MALUKI is a dynamic game story about cute creatures scattered across different worlds. Filled with bright colors, magical sound and various traps.

Start your adventure, gather all the lost friends and take them to the magical portal leading home. Try not to fall into traps, no matter how fun it is.

EASY TO PLAY
Enjoy simple mechanics.

CHEERFUL
They are funny and awkward, especially when they come together.

MELODIOUS
MALUKI love to sing.
